channel.title: How to make a reg server just read and help plz!
channel.description:
Plz help me i cant make a norm server,first i need to port forward but when i do it just screws up my motem and i cant use internet
plz help!!! i have the server set up and every thing i folo every guide i saw and nothing worked

item.title: How to make a reg server just read and help plz!
item.dc:creator: @x_Devil_x1 x--Devil--x
item.source: How to make a reg server just read and help plz!

item.title: How to make a reg server just read and help plz!
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“firewithin3, post:8, topic:245515”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=321958.msg2545388#msg2545388 date=1227241974]

[quote author=firewithin3 link=topic=321958.msg2545385#msg2545385 date=1227241903]

already did that,and if i port forward,i screw up my motem and no one can connect if i dont

Nope, if you portforward…RIGHT then it wont do that.

portforward.com << go their its cooooll. even though portforwarding takes about 10 seconds.
[/quote]10 seconds if you’ve done it before, it can take up to 10 or more days if you haven’t.

Really? it took me 2 minuets the first time i did it.
[/quote]Hence “up to”, not “a minimum of”.[/quote]

wow…that was stupid. hence i never said anything relating to that…

Really? it took me 2 minuets the first time i did it.
^ ^
Question. Statement.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a reg server just read and help plz!
